desc: The use of scientific knowledge for practical purposes.
example: Technology is changing the way we live.

desc: An electronic device for storing and processing data.
example: He works on his computer all day.

desc: A set of instructions that a computer follows.
example: I installed a new program for editing videos.

desc: A collection of web pages on the internet.
example: Their company has a very professional website.

desc: A software application for phones or computers.
A machine that can perform tasks automatically.
example: The robot cleans the house by itself.

desc: A global system of connected computers.
example: I use the internet to find information.

desc: Related to devices that work using electricity.
Involving or relating to computers or technology.
example: She prefers digital books over paper ones.

desc: Related to society or communication between people.
example: Social media has become very popular.
